page.title: 20A Solihull Health Food Shop.
page.content: We visited a{health food shop}which has recently opened. The shop sells vitamin pills, beans and pulses, dried fruit, nuts, non meat products and food in which artificial colourings and additives are not used. We were told that more women than men used the shop, but people were becoming more aware of the importance of natural food which is not much more expensive than mass produced processed food, and much better for you.Mr. George, the owner, said he also sold herbal remedies for people to treat their illnesses the natural way. {Pupils and teachers from the following {schools compiled this information: {Alderbrook Comprehensive School {Our Lady of the Wayside Primary School {Shirley Heath Primary School {St. Alphege's Primary School {Tudor Grange Comprehensive School.
